attributes.action: Stop the indignity of having cleaners entering opposite sex toilet and washing facilities while we are using them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the absence of warning signs and strict codes of access to opposite sex facilities the unsuspecting general public are being distressed by having opposite sex cleaners walking in while they are using toilet and washing/changing/facilities to clean and/or perform visual inspections.  
Ban cleaners from this undignified humiliating practice which offends public decency and infringes our human rights to privacy, and decency.
